page.title: 08A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: I get up in the morning at 07.00 and have cereal with sugar and milk for breakfast . Then I pack my bag for school. I catch the school bus, which comes every day when school is on;that is from Monday to Friday for about 36 weeks of the year. At school, I have assembly at 08.55 when school starts. After assembly I usually do Maths or English and read. Then I have playtime from 10.40 until 10.55. After this I do Maths if I haven't done it yet or English. Then I write a story until dinner. After that I have another play at approximately 12.35 which ends at 13.00. When I go back into the classroom I either do a Personal Project or sometimes I go up to the playing field.
